name: Flying Bus City Stunts Simulator - Collect stars by performing stunts in 3D modern city
name_original: Flying Bus City Stunts Simulator - Collect stars by performing stunts in 3D modern city
description:
We bring for you very latest and next-gen extreme flying city stunt bus. Tired of playing traditional vehicle simulation games? Wants to fly in the sky with your own extremely amazing city stunt bus? Tighten your seat belts and enjoy a lot of stunts while flying! Control your extreme flying city bus speed.
We are offering you very latest and free to play very addictive flying stunt bus. Fly your bus up on the extreme big city. Explore the modern Mega city by flying the stunning and beautiful sports cars. You have to collect the stars scattered on the Mega city in very short span of time to check flying skills. Avoid collisions and accidents with the skyscrapers otherwise you will destroy your unique flying bus.

Enjoy the thrill of Extreme flying city bus and complete your given task on time and become master of stunts.
GAME FEATURES:

• Adventurous & exciting multiple challenging levels.
• Extreme stunts
• Stunning HD and Amazing 3D Graphics
• Extreme Flight Pilot experience
• Free Mode gameplay
• Realistic controls over the city environment
• Improve Airplane Flight Ability
• Easy and free to use
• Offline Play
• Free to play
• Explore the beautiful open world
• iOS Optimization: runs perfectly on anything from the original iPad 1 to the latest 5th Generation widescreen devices

This is the game you have been waiting for!
We hope you will like our Flying Bus City Stunts and don’t forget to rate us on iTune store!
